title: Focus
description: During the explore stage, you usually come up with a vast amount of ideas and value propositions the product may offer. The success of a product has no direct connection to the number of features it offers. Therefore, a smaller set of cohesive, tuned (targeted) features is usually more effective than a large set of features.

frontMatter.title: Focus
frontMatter.metaDescription: Select an area of specialization to target
